item_category: Mi 11 Lite 5G is stylishly designed with advanced technologies offering a premium mobile experience. The Mi 11 Lite 5G creates a super comfortable, delicate feel in the palm of the hand coming at just 6.81mm slim and 159g ultra light weights. Featuring a 6.55 AMOLED display with protection from Corning Gorilla Glass 6, Mi 11 Lite 5G is framed by exceptionally thin, 1.88mm bezels on top and sides for a balanced, stylish look.
